locations.title: Marina Bay Sands
locations.description: The Marina Bay Sands is a luxury resort that is famous for its infinity pool. It is featured in the movie Crazy Rich Asians as the hotel where the main characters stay.

locations.title: Chijmes
locations.description: Chijmes is a historic building complex in Singapore that has been restored and converted into a dining, shopping, and entertainment hub. It is featured in the movie Crazy Rich Asians as the location of the wedding scene.

locations.title: Newton Food Centre
locations.description: Newton Food Centre is a popular hawker centre in Singapore that offers a wide variety of local dishes. It is featured in the movie Crazy Rich Asians as the location of the street food scene.

SriLanka.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai (1957)
